mapper.insert: insert into persons (pname, pcode, psex, page,pblood,paddr,pnationality,pnative,pfolk) values (#{pname}, #{pcode}, #{psex},#{page},#{pblood},#{paddr},#{pnationality},#{pnative},#{pfolk})
mapper.update: update persons set pname = #{pname}, pcode = #{pcode}, psex = #{psex} , page = #{page}, pblood = #{pblood},paddr = #{paddr} ,pnationality = #{pnationality},pnative = #{pnative},pfolk = #{pfolk} where pid = #{pid}
